members.signatureBeforeChange: private TextEdit probeFormatting(String source, int indentationLevel, String lineSeparator, IRegion[] regions, boolean formatJavadoc)
members.signatureAfterChange: private TextEdit probeFormatting(String source, int indentationLevel, String lineSeparator, IRegion[] regions, boolean includeComments)
diff: -	private TextEdit probeFormatting(String source, int indentationLevel, String lineSeparator, IRegion[] regions, boolean formatJavadoc) {
+	private TextEdit probeFormatting(String source, int indentationLevel, String lineSeparator, IRegion[] regions, boolean includeComments) {
